name: Keg Bearer
summary:
Keg Bearer is a silly tactical board game for 1-4 players. Ideal for families and/or kids.
Play across various maps and terrain features in 3 different modes of play.

The great Keg Bearer (considered to be the king) has a healing 'Keg of ALE' that he sprays upon adjacent units. If you kill this unit then you win as no dwarf wants to fight without his ALE!!
